decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to flood the board with small, cheap creatures and then enchant them with various auras and equipments to quickly buff them up and create a strong attacking force. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of aggressive creatures and push for early damage, while also having some protection and evasion effects like lifelink and flying to ensure the creatures can get through to deal damage. It's a fast-paced, aggressive strategy that aims to close out the game quickly.

This Dimir Control deck focuses on disruption through counterspells and removal spells, while also utilizing powerful card draw and graveyard manipulation. The deck seeks to control the game early on with cards like Counterspell and Snuff Out, before eventually overwhelming the opponent with large threats like Gurmag Angler. The inclusion of Thought Scour and Mental Note helps to fuel the graveyard for cards like Lórien Revealed and Deep Analysis, providing card advantage and flexibility in the late game. The deck aims to outlast opponents through a combination of efficient removal, card advantage, and powerful finishers.

The main idea behind this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a quick and aggressive strategy using low-cost creatures and direct damage spells. The deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures such as Goblin Tomb Raider and Goblin Bushwhacker, as well as powerful burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast to quickly bring down the opponent's life total. The deck also includes cards to generate additional tokens for more aggression, while also including some removal spells to clear the path for the aggressive creatures.

This deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with artifact creatures and utilizing sacrifice effects to gain advantages. It also includes burn spells to help finish off the opponent or deal with threats on the board. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells, while also drawing cards to keep up the pressure. The mana base includes artifact lands to help enable metalcraft abilities and support the overall strategy of the deck.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle, utilizing low-cost creatures and burn spells to deal damage efficiently. By maximizing the use of red creatures and direct damage spells, the deck aims to maintain constant pressure on the opponent and finish the game before they have a chance to stabilize. With a focus on speed and consistency, this deck aims to win the game in the early turns through a combination of creature attacks and direct damage spells.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly build a board presence with low-cost creatures and utilize cards like Guardians' Pledge and Battle Screech to swarm the opponent with a large number of creatures. The deck also includes some life gain options with Lunarch Veteran and Suture Priest to provide some resilience against aggro and burn strategies. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and combat tricks to secure victory.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by utilizing cards that generate value over time, like Sunscape Familiar and God-Pharaoh's Faithful. The deck also includes key cards like Archaeomancer and Mulldrifter to recur valuable spells and provide card advantage. Ephemerate is used to blink creatures and trigger their enter the battlefield effects multiple times. The deck also includes counter spells like Negate to disrupt opponents and removal spells like Snuff Out to deal with threats. The goal is to out-value the opponent and eventually win through incremental advantage.

The focus of this Gruul Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient mana ramp. By deploying threats like the Eldrazi Repurposer and Nyxborn Hydra early, supported by cards such as Arbor Elf and Wild Growth, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent and secure a fast victory. With a mix of big creatures and pump spells like Malevolent Rumble and Bushwhack, this deck is designed to be fast-paced and relentless in its attacks.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing the Urzatron lands to generate large amounts of mana. It also includes cards like Myr Retriever and Candy Trail for card advantage and board presence. The deck aims to ramp up quickly and overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells like Deadly Dispute and Weather the Storm. It also includes Myr creatures for additional support and value. The goal is to outlast the opponent and eventually win through a combination of efficient removal and overwhelming board presence.
